short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import holiday and homeworking in Holiday forecast

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Holiday forecast is a web application that allows to share leaves and homeworking days with all users of the application.

This browser extension allows to:
- import holidays in Holiday forecast from other sources in one click (supported sources are eblox HR and Sopra HR4You),
- display week status for your user,
- display your username on Holiday forecast and other sources,
- access quickly Holiday forecast and other sources.
